alert.note: Alert for Flathead, Mission Valleys; Potomac, Seeley Lake Region; West Glacier Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 22 at 5:46PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Lake and southeastern Sanders Counties through 615 PM MDT... At 545 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southwest of Ronan, or 17 miles south of Polson, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Heavy rain and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ronan, Pablo, Turtle Lake, Allentown, Kicking Horse, and Charlo. This includes Highway 93 N between mile markers 39 and 54. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Flathead, Mission Valleys; Potomac, Seeley Lake Region; West Glacier Region
